quotes: Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, shift your energy to what you can create.
The best way to understanding is a few good examples.
Do not stop thinking of life as an adventure.
People should pursue what they're passionate about. That will make them happier than pretty much anything else.
It is not the knowing that is difficult, but the doing.
Don't wait for extraordinary opportunities. Seize common occasions and make them great.
Intense love does not measure, it just gives.
Creative people are often found either disagreeable or intimidating by mediocrities.
Change is hard at first, messy in the middle and gorgeous at the end.
Wealth is the product of man's capacity to think.
You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
Every moment is a fresh beginning.
The busy man is never wise and the wise man is never busy.
Never do to others what you would not like them to do to you.
When you have to make a choice and don't make it, that is in itself a choice.
Conscience is a man's compass.
Problems remain as problems because people are busy defending them rather than finding solutions.
Rich people have small TVs and big libraries, and poor people have small libraries and big TVs.
The greater the impact you want to make, the greater your influence needs to be.
It is indeed a radical act of love just to sit down and be quiet for a time by yourself.
It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
Never was anything great achieved without danger.
The more rejection you get, the better you are, the more you've learned, the closer you are to your outcome.
Our life is what our thoughts make it. A man will find that as he alters his thoughts toward things and other people, things and other people will alter towards him.
Life must be rich and full of loving-it's no good otherwise, no good at all, for anyone.
At the center of your being you have the answer; you know who you are and you know what you want.
Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.
The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.
Nothing is easier than fault finding.
Distant water does not put out a nearby fire.
We tend to live up to our expectations.
Always keep your eyes open. Keep watching. Because whatever you see can inspire you.
If you want to see things just as they are, then you yourself must practice just as you are.
Make yourself so useful to other people, that they think you are irreplaceable.
I have no methods; all I do is accept people as they are.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
Adventure is worthwhile in itself.
No one has ever become poor by giving.
If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
The greatest step towards a life of simplicity is to learn to let go.
You are today where your thoughts have brought you.
No matter how tall the mountain is, it cannot block the sun.
If you do not push the boundaries, you will never know where they are.
Why live an ordinary life, when you can live an extraordinary one.
Winners never quit and quitters never win.
Till it has loved, no man or woman can become itself.
It's not whether you get knocked down, its whether you get back up.
Do not use life to give life to death. Do not use death to bring death to life.
